content: **this hat is available for free but i would love your support would you consider donating or joining my coffee page this helps support yarn and future designs thanks ** coffee page link link text 1 the adams hat is a simple yet stylish beanie featuring a ribbed chevron pattern created with a mix of knits and purls it begins with a tubular cast-on for a polished edge and transitions into the ribbed chevron design the hat is finished with a thoughtfully designed decrease pattern that echoes the ribbing for a cohesive look if you re looking for a pattern that is both easy to memorize and creates a stretchy elegant design the adams hat is perfect for you thank you for supporting my designs be sure to tag me on instagram @woolenthusiast so i can admire your finished adams hats would you like to support my future designs consider joining my coffee page for early access to patterns exclusive content and behind-the-scenes updates your support means the world to me note this pattern is incredibly stretchy i knit the worsted weight version in size large and it fits me with a 24 head circumference as well as friends whose head circumferences range from 21 to 23 you can comfortably add about 4 of ease to the sizes if desired the dk weight version also knit in size large fits similarly but with a slightly snugger feel if you prefer a smaller size for a child / teenager size or a more fitted look i recommend trying the dk weight version ultimately it s up to your preference sizes small large measurements worsted weight version 18 21 / 46 53 cm in circumference dk weight version 16 18 / 39 45 cm in circumference 1 https //buymeacoffee com/woolenthusiast
